item.title: Confidence intervals for longitudinal models in R
item.description: # Libraries necessary for this plot library(lme4) ## Lade n√∂tiges Paket: Matrix library(emmeans) library(ggplot2) # Data and regression model data(sleepstudy) mod <- lmer(Reaction ~ Days + (1|Subject), data=sleepstudy) gr <- ref_grid(mod, cov.keep= c("Days")) emm <- emmeans(gr, spec= c('Days'), level= 0.95) # Plot ggplot(data = sleepstudy, mapping = aes(x = Days, y = Reaction, col = Subject)) + geom_line() + geom_line(data = data.frame(emm), mapping = aes(y = emmean, col = NULL)) + geom_ribbon(data = data.
